Initial Blog Post

This is the 1st post … The site was created to coincide with a reorganisation of my GitHub repos, also to explore GitHub web hosting capabilities and perhaps provide a bit of insight into my newly renamed public code repos. Hopefully with further tidying up they will provide a usable and useful resource !
